alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Charlotte, southwestern DeSoto and southeastern Sarasota Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port Charlotte, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Port, Punta Gorda, Port Charlotte, Murdock, Lake Suzy, Solana, Harbour Heights, Charlotte Harbor, Cleveland and Warm Mineral Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Sarasota
